TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 156
TEI.2.document_title: George Tennille to JEB and J Austin, 12-xx-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: George Tennille in account with J. B. and J. Austin. [December (?), 1828]. Bill and price list.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 156

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*George Tennille in account with J. B. and J. Austin. [December (?), 1828]. Bill and price list.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*date_mentioned n="12-xx-1828">[December (?) 1828.]*/date_mentioned*
*p**person_mentioned*Judge Tennel*/person_mentioned* [George Tennille]*/p* *p*Bot from *person_mentioned*J B and J. Austin*/person_mentioned*—*/p* *p*1/2 Doz Cups and Saucers @_ - $1.00*/p* *p*1/2 Doz Spoons_______ .50*/p*
*p*A Doz plates_ .37 1/2*/p*
*p*1 lbs Tea—_______3.00*/p*
*p*1 Carving Knife——__ 0.75*/p*
*p*1 Wilson Ditto____ 0.50*/p*
*p*1 Tea Pot Brittania__ 3.50*/p*
*p*6 lbs Sugar a 209___ 1.20*/p*
*p*10 lbs Coffee @ 3 1/2___ 3.75*/p*
*p*1 Bottle Mustard @ 4 1/2_____$0. 50*/p*
*p*2 Handkfs @ 75 and 5/8_____ 1.37 1/2*/p*
*p*2 lbs Tobacco @ $2.00—_____ 10.00*/p*
*p*6 1/2 Yds. Hamdton Stripe @ 6 1/2_______ 5.06 1/4*/p*
*p*2 lbs Powder @ $1.00—_____ 2.00*/p*
*p*4 lbs Lead @ 25—— 1.00*/p*
*p*$35.51 1/4*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Tennel*/person_mentioned*'s Act with*person_mentioned* J. B. and J Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
